MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB380201255
Licensee Name: Lutheran Social Services of Michigan Inc
Licensee Address: 8131 East Jefferson Avenue
Detroit, MI 48214-2691
Licensee Telephone #: (313) 823-7700
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Sean de Four, Designee
Name of Facility: Lutheran Social Services of MI- Jackson
Facility Address: Ste 200
729 W. Michigan Ave.
Jackson, MI 49201
Facility Telephone #: (517) 789-6444
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Lutheran Social Services of MI- Jackson has requested approval to move to a new
office at:
Ste 200
729 W. Michigan Ave.
Jackson, MI 49201
In addition, the agency director, Diana Ripley, advised that their satellite office
located in Ann Arbor will no longer be designated under this license.
III. Methodology
Ms. Ripley assisted with an on-site walk through of the new office space on
10/13/2014. Ms. Ripley reported an implementation date of 10/20/2014 for the
planned move.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The proposed office space has ample offices and cubicles for staff, visitation rooms
and meeting rooms, and secured storage rooms for file storage. The agency has
renovated the space and put in new furniture, carpet and paint. The doors
throughout will be secured and accessible via staff swipe cards. The agency is also
in the process of having an elevator installed to make the space handicap
accessible, as they are on the second floor. Although there are currently no
identified individuals (children, families, foster parents, etc) in need of an elevator,
the agency has developed a contingency plan should this need arise. Ms. Ripley
has an agreement with the church directly next door, who has agreed to allow
access to their building which is handicap accessible until the elevator is operable.
The building is more than sufficient for providing the services offered by the agency.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the agency move to the new location in Jackson be approved. In
addition this license will no longer have the Ann Arbor branch under their domain.
October 22, 2014
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date
Licensing Consultant
2
